column5: I was doing a search for a movie called the swordsman with Jet Li and somehow came across a related field called the romantic swordsman. I don't know what the words or music is about but I thought it sound nice. Anyone else have other foreign music that may sound interesting?  The Romantic Swordsman(New Version)-4:15 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pEPqszFJqc8  Alternate Theme(Duet)-3:08 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OOKkcqBMaTU
My favourite foreign music is the soundtrack from Akira.  It's japanese but it's not really a 'normal' musical style of Japan - Akira was sci-fi and the soundtrack was really different.
Right up my alley, guys. I love foreign classics.
Man, this brings back a lot of memories!

Something I picked up in the weight room when I was posted in Germany for a time.  Maybe a little too heavy for most but great music while pumping Iron.    http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mm2eT-sTVys http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4w9EksAo5hY...ted&search= http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nbZa_9BnMOw...ted&search=
A much better Japanese film and song  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MVKySmZ-nPk...ted&search=
